item.title: Inventory: Overview
item.description:
Extranet Overview The Inventory extranet allows the Buyer to access and configure the SetUp of the dynamic inventory from all the Channel Managers connected to you. You will have access to different tools, components and panels to create, modify or edit hotels, rates, rooms and sales conditions. Inventory is also available to load your own static contracts as a Seller: load allotment, prices, discounts, supplements… Sections Once you are logged in, you will be redirected to the home page where you’ll see the following tabs.
[...]
